snippet: A team of weapons inspectors has begun the groundwork for destroying Syria’s chemical arms, but it is unclear how it will navigate the complex task amid a civil war.
abstract: Advance team of international weapons inspectors begins taking first steps toward dismantling Syria's chemical weapons arsenal, but it is unclear how it will navigate the complex task amid a civil war.
lead_paragraph: A team of weapons inspectors has begun the groundwork for destroying Syria’s chemical arms, but it is unclear how it will navigate the complex task amid a civil war.

headline.main: Weapons Inspection Team Begins Work in Syria
headline.print_headline: Weapons Inspection Team Begins Work in Syria
